bars.name: Alchemy Bar
bars.description: For the perfect antidote to all that pre-vacation stress, try a unique cocktail custom-concocted by our mix-masters.
bars.signature_drinks: Cucumber Sunrise, The Perfect Storm, Spicy Chipotle Pineapple Martini

bars.name: RedFrog Rum Bar
bars.description: Get into the island vibe at this tropical hangout, serving your fave rum drinks and our own private-label draft beer.
bars.signature_drinks: Rum Runner, Bearded Clam, ThirstyFrog Red beer

bars.name: BlueIguana Tequila Bar
bars.description: Feel like a frozen tequila drink? How about an ice-cold Mexican beer? Grab a stool, amigo. This is where you wanna be.
bars.signature_drinks: Frozen Margaritas, Mexican Beers, Tequila Flights

bars.name: The Lime & Coconut
bars.description: The Lime and Coconut turns the vacay vibes way, way up with DJs, live music and pool bars serving all your favorite poolside cocktails.
bars.signature_drinks: Lime & Coconut (lime juice, coconut syrup, guava syrup, coconut milk and Malibu coconut rum)

bars.name: Schooner Bar
bars.description: A Royal Caribbean signature venue with a nautical theme and classic cocktails.

bars.name: Sugarcane Mojito Bar
bars.description: Offers a host of unique flavors, including raspberry guava, jalapeno cucumber, and spicy passion fruit.
bars.signature_drinks: Pineapple Coconut Mojito, Raspberry Guava Mojito, Spicy Passion Fruit Mojito

bars.name: Maltings Beer & Whiskey Bar
bars.description: Great place to catch up on the craft beer scene at sea with 50 bottled beers and 24 draft beers on tap.

bars.name: Vibe Beach Club
bars.description: Private retreat for guests ages 18 and older with cushioned chaise lounges, ocean views, and relaxing whirlpools.

bars.name: Skyy Vodka Ice Bar
bars.description: Made entirely of ice, inspired by Scandinavian ice hotels. A brisk 17 degrees Fahrenheit inside.

bars.name: O'Sheehan's Neighbourhood Bar & Grill
bars.description: Irish-style pub open around the clock with wide-ranging beer selection, food, pool tables, darts, and flat-screen TVs for sports.
